queue.text:
@claw Task: Build social mention ingestion bridge for Slack
Owner: @claw
Acceptance Criteria:
- fetch social channel mentions into queue
- map actionable mentions into OpsHub payload
- provide diagnostics fallback when feed unavailable
Priority: high
